phaseDescription: Actively probing the target network to identify live hosts, open ports, and running services, laying the groundwork for further analysis.

tools.toolDescription: Performs network scanning to detect live hosts, open ports, services, and operating systems.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Runs a stealth SYN scan on all ports with OS detection, version detection, script scanning, and traceroute.
Detects service versions on ports 80 and 443.

tools.toolDescription: Rapidly scans large networks for open ports with high performance.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Scans all ports on the 192.168.1.0/24 network at 1000 packets per second.

tools.toolDescription: A fast, stateless scanner for identifying open TCP and UDP ports.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Performs a TCP scan on all ports across the 192.168.1.0/24 network.

tools.toolDescription: A cross-platform GUI tool for scanning IP ranges to identify live hosts and open ports.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Starts the application.

toolCommands.toolCommand: Input IP range (e.g., 192.168.1.0/24) and start scan
toolCommands.commandDescription: Scans the specified range for live hosts and open ports.

tools.toolDescription: A versatile networking tool for port scanning, banner grabbing, and basic connectivity testing.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Scans ports 1-1000 on example.com, reporting open ones.

tools.toolDescription: Generates custom packets for scanning and testing network responses.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Sends 1000 SYN packets to port 80 on example.com to test availability.

tools.toolDescription: A modern, fast port scanner optimized for speed and flexibility.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Scans all ports on 192.168.1.100.

tools.toolDescription: A lightweight port scanner focused on speed and simplicity.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Scans common ports on example.com.

tools.toolDescription: The official GUI for Nmap, providing a visual interface for scan configuration and results.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Starts the Zenmap application.
Runs a comprehensive scan with OS and version detection.

tools.toolDescription: A Windows-based tool for querying open ports and troubleshooting connectivity.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Queries port 80 on example.com to check its status.

tools.toolDescription: A network address discovering tool that uses ARP requests to find live hosts.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Discovers live hosts in the 192.168.1.0/24 network using ARP.

tools.toolDescription: A powerful command-line packet analyzer for capturing and analyzing network traffic.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Captures packets on eth0 interface without DNS resolution.

tools.toolDescription: Sends ARP requests to determine if a host is alive on the network.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Sends 3 ARP requests to check if the host is alive.

tools.toolDescription: Monitors ARP activity on the network to detect ARP spoofing attacks.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Monitors ARP activity on the eth0 interface.

tools.toolDescription: A network protocol analyzer for capturing and analyzing network traffic.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Launches the Wireshark GUI for packet analysis.
Captures 100 packets on eth0 using command-line interface.

tools.toolDescription: Command-line version of Wireshark for packet capture and analysis.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Captures HTTP traffic on port 80.
